sentence: Among the underlying components of the Russell 3000 index, we saw noteworthy options trading volume today in Home Depot Inc (Symbol: HD), where a total of 34,946 contracts have traded so far, representing approximately 3.5 million underlying shares.
That amounts to about 79.8% of HD's average daily trading volume over the past month of 4.4 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $200 strike put option expiring January 19, 2018 , with 2,732 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 273,200 underlying shares of HD.

Below is a chart showing HD's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $200 strike highlighted in orange:

Golden Entertainment Inc (Symbol: GDEN) saw options trading volume of 705 contracts, representing approximately 70,500 underlying shares or approximately 73.1% of GDEN's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 96,420 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $40 strike put option expiring January 19, 2018 , with 540 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 54,000 underlying shares of GDEN.

Below is a chart showing GDEN's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $40 strike highlighted in orange:

And Palo Alto Networks, Inc (Symbol: PANW) saw options trading volume of 6,647 contracts, representing approximately 664,700 underlying shares or approximately 72.5% of PANW's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 916,385 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $152.50 strike put option expiring January 26, 2018 , with 949 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 94,900 underlying shares of PANW.

Below is a chart showing PANW's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $152.50 strike highlighted in orange:

For the various different available expirations for HD options , GDEN options , or PANW options , visit StockOptionsChannel.com.
